00112         struct UserTone {

00117         };

00120         struct StartParam {
00122             StartParam() {
00123                 use_tone = TRUE;
00124                 tone = ToneDTMF0;
00125                 play_count = 1;
00126                 mix_factor = 0x4000;
00127             };
00129             BOOLEAN use_tone;

00132                 Tone tone;

00135                     UserTone* user_tone;

00139                     ToneType tone_type;     
00140                 } UTone;
00141             };
00142

00149         };
